>>Define “Design Quality”? <<
( ) the manufacturing of products to avoid giving customers what they don’t want or would not like to have (x) the design of products that give customers what they want or would like to have ( ) how much is produced and when it is produced ( ) how well it is produced
[Explanation] We have defined “design quality” as the design of products that give customers what they want or would like to have. [Explanation]

choicegroup.choice: the manufacturing of products to avoid giving customers what they don’t want or would not like to have
the design of products that give customers what they want or would like to have
how much is produced and when it is produced

div.p: We have defined “design quality” as the design of products that give customers what they want or would like to have.
